sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
An excellent ditty called the shepherds wooing fair Dulcina To a new tune called Dulcina.
1 sheet ([1] p.) : ill. (woodcuts)
Printed for F. Coles, T. Vere, and W Gilbertson, [London] : [between 1658-1664]
Wing CD-ROM, 1996 gives range of dates: 1658-1664. Verse - "As at noon Dulcina rested,". Place and date of publication from Wing CD-ROM, 1996. Filmed copy at Adam Matthew's set Women Advising Women: Part 5: Women's writing and advice, c1450-1720, reel 3, Douce Ballads 2[132], creased and cropped at head and foot, with loss of title, text and imprint. Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library, Oxford, England.
=======
An excellent ditty called the shepherds wooing fair Dulcina To a new tune called Dulcina.
1 sheet ([1] p.) : ill. (woodcuts)
Printed for F. Coles, T. Vere, and W Gilbertson, [London] : [between 1658-1664]
Wing CD-ROM, 1996 gives range of dates: 1658-1664. Verse - "As at noon Dulcina rested,". Place and date of publication from Wing CD-ROM, 1996. Filmed copy at Adam Matthew's set Women Advising Women: Part 5: Women's writing and advice, c1450-1720, reel 3, Douce Ballads 2[132], creased and cropped at head and foot, with loss of title, text and imprint. Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library, Oxford, England.
